TASK: Craft an item of type: crimson_door
inventory=[{"type": "blue_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 41, "index": 23}, {"type": "diamond_block", "quantity": 63, "index": 27}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 2, "index": 34}, {"type": "spruce_door", "quantity": 16, "index": 40}, {"type": "donkey_spawn_egg", "quantity": 14, "index": 43}]

thought: To craft a crimson door, I need to first craft 6 crimson planks. To craft 6 crimson planks, I need to craft 2 crimson planks, and then craft 2 more crimson planks. To craft 2 crimson planks, I need to place 1 stripped crimson stem in the crafting table. Therefore, I will first move the stripped crimson stem from slot 34 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 34 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: crimson_door
inventory=[{"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "blue_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 41, "index": 23}, {"type": "diamond_block", "quantity": 63, "index": 27}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "spruce_door", "quantity": 16, "index": 40}, {"type": "donkey_spawn_egg", "quantity": 14, "index": 43}]
thought: Now that I have crafted the crimson planks, I need to move them to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4
